mapper.update: UPDATE material SET m_name = #{mName}, m_category = #{mCategory}, m_price = #{mPrice}, m_company_id = #{mCompanyId}, m_unit_code = (SELECT code_no FROM code WHERE code_name = #{mUnitCode}), m_date = TO_DATE(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), m_info = #{mInfo} WHERE m_no = #{mNo}
mapper.select: SELECT m.m_no, m.m_company_id, m.m_category, m.m_name, (mio.mio_input_quantity - mio.mio_output_quantity) AS m_stock, mio.mio_output_quantity AS increase, m.m_date, mio.mio_input_date, mio.mio_output_date FROM Material m JOIN Material_io mio ON m.m_no = mio.mio_no ORDER BY m.m_no
